Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The Disputes System must provide different levels of access with regard to disputes case initiation and follow-up actions.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Usability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.': Functional Suitability
'Realtor shall be able to generate a CMA report based on property criteria': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall be able to cancel a clinical lab section only if there are no students registered for that clinical lab section.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall have a customizable Look and Feel.': Functional Suitability
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional Suitability
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Performance Efficiency
'The Disputes application shall ensure that only users with the appropriate access level are allowed to initiate dispute requests.': Security
'The RFS system should be available 24/7 especially during the budgeting period. The RFS system shall be available 90% of the time all year and 98% during the budgeting period. 2% of the time the system will become available within 1 hour of the time that the situation is reported.': Reliability
'The streaming server will support 50 simultaneous streaming connections.': Performance Efficiency
'The website shall make its user aware of its information practices before collection data from them via a Privacy Policy accessible on all pages of the website.': Security
'Only registered realtors shall be able to access the system.': Security
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a single student to a cohort': Functional Suitability
'The product shall make the users want to use it. 80% of the users surveyed report they are regularly using the product after the first 2 weeks post-launch.': Usability
'System shall let customers register on the website as a “unlimited movie subscriber” user in under 10 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The product will be available for licensing as a one-server two-five servers or five-or-more servers license.': Compatibility
'Out of 1000 accesses to the system the system is available 999 times.': Reliability
'The response time shall be fast enough to maintain the flow of the game. The response time shall be no more than 2 seconds for 95% of responses and no more than 4% for the remaining responses.': Performance Efficiency
'The interface shall be easy to use. 90% of users should be able to successfully use the system to generate a report on their first use. The interface should adhere to IBM usability standards.': Usability
'The system shall display clear property images in the search results': Functional Suitability
'Changes to revenue and expense formulae must be applied to the RFS system every year prior to the budgeting process start. Revenue and expense formulae will be updated within one week of their receipt after which 2 weeks will be allotted to testing of the budget calculations to be conducted jointly by the project development team and PCG Finance.': Maintainability
'The product shall simulate the look of ships at sea.': Usability
'The product shall be updated on a regular basis.The product will have a new major feature introduced every six months and quarterly maintenance releases every six months.': Maintainability
The interface shall have a simple look. In the interface and usability survey 90% of beta testers must report that the interface is adequately simple.': Usability
'Website must be fully operational with MSN TV2.': Compatibility
'The top 1/4 of the table will hold events that are to occur sequentially.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be able to process all transactions.The product shall process minimum of 1 million transactions per year.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall interface CSR and Datastream.The product shall exchange messages between CSR and EAM on a real time basis without any direct interfaces between two systems.': Compatibility
'The WCS system must run queries to the WCS databases once again (on a specified day) to update the available data available to CCR users. Queries must be made to external databases for data refresh once a week.': Maintainability
'The product shall process messages within 2 seconds.The product shall have a maximum message processing time of 2 seconds': Performance Efficiency
'A primary database will be used to store cached data for active users.': Compatibility
'The system shall generate an audit report based on the available recycled parts and the collision estimate.': Functional Suitability
'98% of the user workstations shall meet the minimum hardware requirements prior to implementation. Minimum Hard Disk Space: 400MB.': Compatibility
'Product formulas shall allow use of semi-products which have own formulas.': Functional Suitability
'The audit report shall include the percentage of available recycled parts used in the estimate ': Functional Suitability
'The table side of the display shall be split into 2 regions: sequential and temporal.': Functional Suitability
The product shall ensure that only supervisors can advertise empty time slots.The product must ensure that supervisors are allowed to access advertise empty time slots.': Security
'All movies shall be streamed on demand at any time of the day.': Reliability
'The Commissioner will be the only authorized user per league to adjust league settings.': Security
'The website design should be modern clean and concise.': Usability
'The website shall continue to operate if the payment gateway goes down.': Reliability
'The CMA report shall be returned no later 60 seconds after the user has entered the CMA report criteria.': Performance Efficiency
'Only authorized user shall access the RFS system. ONLY users that exist in the UAS system with the RFS system assigned to their role(s) shall access the RFS system and use it.': Security
'The system shall operate within the Windows XP Professional operating system.': Compatibility
'The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.': Usability
'The system shall have a professional appearance': Usability
'Website shall request and authorize credit card payment before allowing a user to stream a movie.': Functional Suitability
'Promotional updates to the website should take a day to update.': Maintainability
'The same hardware supporting the current website will be used to support the new system.': Compatibility
'The product shall allow a player to position ships horizontally on their grid.': Functional Suitability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall be easy for customers with novice skills on the Internet to purchase and watch streaming movies. Customers should be able to purchase and watch a pre-determined movie in under 3 minutes.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The system shall be able to call the seller or buyer to schedule an appointment': Functional Suitability
'The application shall ask the user to confirm dropping a player or trading a player before performing the action.': Usability
'The system shall protect private information in accordance with the organization’s information policy.': Security
'100% of cardmember services representatives shall be able to successfully create a dispute case on the first encounter after completing the training course.': Usability
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting clinicals including but not limited to clinical section capacity changes and clinical section cancellations.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Posting and Billing System. This will allow the Disputes application to request adjustments to cardmember and merchant’s accounts. All adjustment requests must be sent to the Cardmember Posting and Billing System.': Compatibility
'The product shall maintain the status of each player for a turn either offensive or defensive.': Functional Suitability
'The application shall be able to complete every user transaction within one fourth of a second of receiving the request over the network.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall run on the existing hardware for all environments.': Compatibility
'The users should be able to easily use the system to successfully complete their budgets within the stipulated time for completion. With a week of training prior to product implementation 98% of the users shall complete their budgets within the stipulated time.': Usability
'The product shall be robust with fault tolerance.The product shall have fault tolerance by using recovery technique compensatory transaction and routing around failures.': Reliability
'The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall interface with the ChoiceParts system once per day at approximately 1:00 AM.': Compatibility
'If the shot was marked as a miss the product shall change the status of the offensive player to defensive': Functional Suitability
'Once a game is initiated the product shall allow each player to position their 5 ships on their respective defensive grids.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to a Nursing Student including student ID student name phone number e-mail status (full time or part time) and program of study.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.': Usability
'The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.': Usability
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional Suitability
'The streaming server will have anti-virus software to prevent infection of malicious viruses.': Security
'The system shall provide a history report of changes made to the Activity or Event data': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow a player to initiate a game by selecting another available player from the list of players.': Functional Suitability
'All aspects of the website shall be accessed by a web browser over the Internet.': Compatibility
'The product shall be supported using the corporate support center.': Compatibility
'A clinical lab section shall include the clinical site name the class instructor day and time of the lab.': Functional Suitability
'Website must interface with the CyberSource API to process credit card transactions.': Compatibility
'The preferred repair facility ratings shall be saved by the system.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System shall generate a User Report that details any new users that have been added and any changes to an existing user’s access level. The report will be reviewed for auditing purposes.': Security
'The product will function alongside server software on any operating system where the Java runtime can be installed.': Compatibility
'Administrator shall be able to activate a pre-paid card via the Administration section in under 5 seconds.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall have the ability to receive automatic software updates as new threats emerge. 100% of customers will be able to receive automatic software updates transmitted to the installed product.': Security
'100% of saved user preferences shall be restored when system comes back online.': Reliability
'The user shall select to save the preferred repair facility ratings.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall comply with corporate color scheme': Usability
'The Disputes System must allow the users to select disputable transactions (based on the age of the transaction) from a user interface and initiate a dispute (ticket retrieval request or chargeback notification) on the selected transaction.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year': Reliability
'The available recycled parts information and their suppliers shall be returned to the user.': Functional Suitability
'The maintenance of the product will fall within the established corporate maintenance windows.': Compatibility
'The product shall be capable of handling the existing 1000 users. This number is expected to grow 5 times within the next year.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall create an exception log of problems encountered within the product for transmission to our company for analysis and resolution.': Reliability
'A class shall be either a non-clinical class or a clinical class.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. : 90% of new users shall be able to start the display of Events or Activities within 90 minutes of using the product.': Usability
'The product shall be able to be installed in the specified environment within 1 working day.': Compatibility
'For each turn the product shall allow the offensive player to define a shot.': Functional Suitability
'Only authorized users shall have access to the portion of the system that interfaces with CampusConnect.': Security
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Usability
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members are the only people who shall have access to clinical site details.': Security

'The system shall help the user avoid making mistakes while scheduling classes and clinicals for the nursing students.': Usability
'The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.': Functional Suitability

'The product shall synchronize contacts and appointments in an acceptable time.': Performance Efficiency

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall provide Asynchronous Messaging.The product shall provide asynchronous messaging to enable parallel processing and reduce the overhead in communications'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

'The product shall ensure that it can only be accessed by authorized users. The product will be able to distinguish between authorized and unauthorized users in all access attempts': Security
'All letter requests must be formatted according to guidelines specified by the Print Letter Utility system.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be able to support multiple remote users': Performance Efficiency
'Only authorized personnel can access sales information.': Security
'Only users with Update access must be able to initiate dispute requests.': Security
'Each team owner will need to use a username and password in order to be authenticated to reach the team owner’s page': Security
'The system shall be able to display a printable summary of the system log.': Functional Suitability
'Website shall allow customers to browse movies by categories entered in by izogn administrator.': Functional Suitability
'The system will use the stored e-mail addresses as a primary means of communicating information to affected parties.': Functional Suitability
'Velkat staff will be available for phone support between 7am-7pm M-F to provide technical support to the Izogn administrators.': Reliability
'The product must be designed using Design Patterns and coding best practices. 90% of maintenance software developers are able to integrate new functionality into the product with 2 working days.': Maintainability
'The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual nursing students which will include (but not be limited to) student name student ID admission date classes credits GPA and the cohort that the student is enrolled in.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual cohorts which will include the students enlisted the Program of study sequence of classes cohort progress through the program and timeline of completion.': Functional Suitability
'For each shot the product shall mark the shot as a hit or miss on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional Suitability
'The server will support a maximum of 1 000 simultaneous users.': Performance Efficiency
'The leads washing functionality will have an interface in which lead data parameters can be maintained.': Functional Suitability
'The leads washing functionality will insert all leads captured by the web service.': Functional Suitability
'For each shot the product shall examine the defensive grid of the defensive player to determine whether the shot was a hit or miss.': Functional Suitability
'System shall let customers register on the website as a “pay as you go” user in under 5 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall notify the realtor when a seller or buyer responds to an appointment request': Functional Suitability
'The product shall conform to the Americans with Disabilities Act.': Usability
'The vendor will verify the invalid lead.': Functional Suitability
'One insurance company shall not be able to view another insurance companys claim data.': Security
'The product shall allow the user to view previously downloaded search results CMA reports and appointments.': Reliability
'100% of the cardmember and merchant services representatives shall use the Disputes application regularly after a 2-day training course.': Usability
'The audit report shall include the total number of recycled parts used in the estimate.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall prevent malicious attacks including denial of service.': Security
'The Disputes application shall support 350 concurrent users without any degradation of performance in the application.': Performance Efficiency
'The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.': Usability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add new classes to a sequence of classes': Functional Suitability
'Only administrators can activate a pre-paid card.': Security
'The product will display an available status for unreserved conference rooms.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be robust.The product shall have fault avoidance based on standards adoption.': Reliability
'The product shall display room equipment according to search parameters.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Information Database. The Cardmember Information Database provides detailed information with regard to a cardmember. All cardmember detail information must be obtained from the Cardmember Information Database.': Compatibility
'The Disputes System shall record the name of the user and the date for any activity that creates or modifies the disputes case in the system. A detailed history of the actions taken on the case including the date and the user that performed the action must be maintained for auditing purposes.': Functional Suitability
'Customer shall be able to check the status of their prepaid card by entering in the PIN number in under 5 seconds.': Performance Efficiency
'A secondary database will be used to store historical statistics and data.': Compatibility
'Izogn Administrator must be able to add new products to the website within 2 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall be built such that it is as secure as possible from malicious interference.': Security
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Statement Database. The Statement Database provides the transaction details to the Disputes System. All transaction details must be obtained from the Statement Database': Compatibility
'The product shall allow a user to remove himself or herself from the list of players at any time.': Functional Suitability
'Movies shall be encoded for 56k and 256k streams.': Compatibility
'Only collision estimators shall search for recycled parts. Users without the collision estimator role shall not have access to the search for recycled parts.': Security
'Movies shall be encoded and streamed via Windows Media Player 9.0.': Compatibility
'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.': Performance Efficiency
'Clinical site information shall include (but not be limited to) the name of the site contact person and contact information.': Functional Suitability
'The response time of general student management tasks shall take no longer than 5 seconds and the response time of schedule generation shall take no longer than 30 seconds.': Performance Efficiency
The system must be available for use between 7:00AM and 11:59PM all days of the year.': Reliability
'The product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be platform independent.The product shall enable access to any type of development environment and platform.': Compatibility
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Usability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.': Functional Suitability
'Realtor shall be able to generate a CMA report based on property criteria': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall be able to cancel a clinical lab section only if there are no students registered for that clinical lab section.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall have a customizable Look and Feel.': Functional Suitability
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional Suitability
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Performance Efficiency
'The Disputes application shall ensure that only users with the appropriate access level are allowed to initiate dispute requests.': Security
'The RFS system should be available 24/7 especially during the budgeting period. The RFS system shall be available 90% of the time all year and 98% during the budgeting period. 2% of the time the system will become available within 1 hour of the time that the situation is reported.': Reliability
'The streaming server will support 50 simultaneous streaming connections.': Performance Efficiency
'The website shall make its user aware of its information practices before collection data from them via a Privacy Policy accessible on all pages of the website.': Security
'Only registered realtors shall be able to access the system.': Security
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a single student to a cohort': Functional Suitability
'The product shall make the users want to use it. 80% of the users surveyed report they are regularly using the product after the first 2 weeks post-launch.': Usability
'System shall let customers register on the website as a “unlimited movie subscriber” user in under 10 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The product will be available for licensing as a one-server two-five servers or five-or-more servers license.': Compatibility
'Out of 1000 accesses to the system the system is available 999 times.': Reliability
'The response time shall be fast enough to maintain the flow of the game. The response time shall be no more than 2 seconds for 95% of responses and no more than 4% for the remaining responses.': Performance Efficiency
'The interface shall be easy to use. 90% of users should be able to successfully use the system to generate a report on their first use. The interface should adhere to IBM usability standards.': Usability
'The system shall display clear property images in the search results': Functional Suitability
'Changes to revenue and expense formulae must be applied to the RFS system every year prior to the budgeting process start. Revenue and expense formulae will be updated within one week of their receipt after which 2 weeks will be allotted to testing of the budget calculations to be conducted jointly by the project development team and PCG Finance.': Maintainability
'The product shall simulate the look of ships at sea.': Usability
'The product shall be updated on a regular basis.The product will have a new major feature introduced every six months and quarterly maintenance releases every six months.': Maintainability
The interface shall have a simple look. In the interface and usability survey 90% of beta testers must report that the interface is adequately simple.': Usability
'Website must be fully operational with MSN TV2.': Compatibility
'The top 1/4 of the table will hold events that are to occur sequentially.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be able to process all transactions.The product shall process minimum of 1 million transactions per year.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall interface CSR and Datastream.The product shall exchange messages between CSR and EAM on a real time basis without any direct interfaces between two systems.': Compatibility
'The WCS system must run queries to the WCS databases once again (on a specified day) to update the available data available to CCR users. Queries must be made to external databases for data refresh once a week.': Maintainability
'The product shall process messages within 2 seconds.The product shall have a maximum message processing time of 2 seconds': Performance Efficiency
'A primary database will be used to store cached data for active users.': Compatibility
'The system shall generate an audit report based on the available recycled parts and the collision estimate.': Functional Suitability
'98% of the user workstations shall meet the minimum hardware requirements prior to implementation. Minimum Hard Disk Space: 400MB.': Compatibility
'Product formulas shall allow use of semi-products which have own formulas.': Functional Suitability
'The audit report shall include the percentage of available recycled parts used in the estimate ': Functional Suitability
'The table side of the display shall be split into 2 regions: sequential and temporal.': Functional Suitability
The product shall ensure that only supervisors can advertise empty time slots.The product must ensure that supervisors are allowed to access advertise empty time slots.': Security
'All movies shall be streamed on demand at any time of the day.': Reliability
'The Commissioner will be the only authorized user per league to adjust league settings.': Security
'The website design should be modern clean and concise.': Usability
'The website shall continue to operate if the payment gateway goes down.': Reliability
'The CMA report shall be returned no later 60 seconds after the user has entered the CMA report criteria.': Performance Efficiency
'Only authorized user shall access the RFS system. ONLY users that exist in the UAS system with the RFS system assigned to their role(s) shall access the RFS system and use it.': Security
'The system shall operate within the Windows XP Professional operating system.': Compatibility
'The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.': Usability
'The system shall have a professional appearance': Usability
'Website shall request and authorize credit card payment before allowing a user to stream a movie.': Functional Suitability
'Promotional updates to the website should take a day to update.': Maintainability
'The same hardware supporting the current website will be used to support the new system.': Compatibility
'The product shall allow a player to position ships horizontally on their grid.': Functional Suitability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Maintenance releases will be offered to customers once a year. The releases shall take no longer than 5 minutes for 80% of the customer base to install.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The system shall be able to call the seller or buyer to schedule an appointment': Functional Suitability
'The application shall ask the user to confirm dropping a player or trading a player before performing the action.': Usability
'The system shall protect private information in accordance with the organization’s information policy.': Security
'100% of cardmember services representatives shall be able to successfully create a dispute case on the first encounter after completing the training course.': Usability
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting clinicals including but not limited to clinical section capacity changes and clinical section cancellations.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Posting and Billing System. This will allow the Disputes application to request adjustments to cardmember and merchant’s accounts. All adjustment requests must be sent to the Cardmember Posting and Billing System.': Compatibility
'The product shall maintain the status of each player for a turn either offensive or defensive.': Functional Suitability
'The application shall be able to complete every user transaction within one fourth of a second of receiving the request over the network.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall run on the existing hardware for all environments.': Compatibility
'The users should be able to easily use the system to successfully complete their budgets within the stipulated time for completion. With a week of training prior to product implementation 98% of the users shall complete their budgets within the stipulated time.': Usability
'The product shall be robust with fault tolerance.The product shall have fault tolerance by using recovery technique compensatory transaction and routing around failures.': Reliability
'The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall interface with the ChoiceParts system once per day at approximately 1:00 AM.': Compatibility
'If the shot was marked as a miss the product shall change the status of the offensive player to defensive': Functional Suitability
'Once a game is initiated the product shall allow each player to position their 5 ships on their respective defensive grids.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to a Nursing Student including student ID student name phone number e-mail status (full time or part time) and program of study.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.': Usability
'The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.': Usability
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional Suitability
'The streaming server will have anti-virus software to prevent infection of malicious viruses.': Security
'The system shall provide a history report of changes made to the Activity or Event data': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow a player to initiate a game by selecting another available player from the list of players.': Functional Suitability
'All aspects of the website shall be accessed by a web browser over the Internet.': Compatibility
'The product shall be supported using the corporate support center.': Compatibility
'A clinical lab section shall include the clinical site name the class instructor day and time of the lab.': Functional Suitability

'Administrator shall be able to activate a pre-paid card via the Administration section in under 5 seconds.': Performance Efficiency

'100% of saved user preferences shall be restored when system comes back online.': Reliability
'The user shall select to save the preferred repair facility ratings.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall comply with corporate color scheme': Usability
'The Disputes System must allow the users to select disputable transactions (based on the age of the transaction) from a user interface and initiate a dispute (ticket retrieval request or chargeback notification) on the selected transaction.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year': Reliability
'The available recycled parts information and their suppliers shall be returned to the user.': Functional Suitability
'The maintenance of the product will fall within the established corporate maintenance windows.': Compatibility
'The product shall be capable of handling the existing 1000 users. This number is expected to grow 5 times within the next year.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall create an exception log of problems encountered within the product for transmission to our company for analysis and resolution.': Reliability
'A class shall be either a non-clinical class or a clinical class.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. : 90% of new users shall be able to start the display of Events or Activities within 90 minutes of using the product.': Usability
'The product shall be able to be installed in the specified environment within 1 working day.': Compatibility

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The Disputes System must provide a confirmation to the user upon the creation of a chargeback request. The confirmation must contain the following information; the dispute case number the type of chargeback requested (pending or immediate) and the date that the merchant response is due.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The system shall be able to call the seller or buyer to schedule an appointment': Functional Suitability
'The application shall ask the user to confirm dropping a player or trading a player before performing the action.': Usability
'The system shall protect private information in accordance with the organization’s information policy.': Security
'100% of cardmember services representatives shall be able to successfully create a dispute case on the first encounter after completing the training course.': Usability
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting clinicals including but not limited to clinical section capacity changes and clinical section cancellations.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Posting and Billing System. This will allow the Disputes application to request adjustments to cardmember and merchant’s accounts. All adjustment requests must be sent to the Cardmember Posting and Billing System.': Compatibility
'The product shall maintain the status of each player for a turn either offensive or defensive.': Functional Suitability
'The application shall be able to complete every user transaction within one fourth of a second of receiving the request over the network.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall run on the existing hardware for all environments.': Compatibility
'The users should be able to easily use the system to successfully complete their budgets within the stipulated time for completion. With a week of training prior to product implementation 98% of the users shall complete their budgets within the stipulated time.': Usability
'The product shall be robust with fault tolerance.The product shall have fault tolerance by using recovery technique compensatory transaction and routing around failures.': Reliability
'The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall interface with the ChoiceParts system once per day at approximately 1:00 AM.': Compatibility
'If the shot was marked as a miss the product shall change the status of the offensive player to defensive': Functional Suitability
'Once a game is initiated the product shall allow each player to position their 5 ships on their respective defensive grids.': Functional Suitability

'The streaming server will have anti-virus software to prevent infection of malicious viruses.': Security

'The available recycled parts information and their suppliers shall be returned to the user.': Functional Suitability

'The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.': Functional Suitability

'The product will be available for licensing as a one-server two-five servers or five-or-more servers license.': Compatibility
'Out of 1000 accesses to the system the system is available 999 times.': Reliability
'The response time shall be fast enough to maintain the flow of the game. The response time shall be no more than 2 seconds for 95% of responses and no more than 4% for the remaining responses.': Performance Efficiency

'The CMA report shall be returned no later 60 seconds after the user has entered the CMA report criteria.': Performance Efficiency
'Only authorized user shall access the RFS system. ONLY users that exist in the UAS system with the RFS system assigned to their role(s) shall access the RFS system and use it.': Security
'The system shall operate within the Windows XP Professional operating system.': Compatibility
'The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.': Usability
'The system shall have a professional appearance': Usability
'Website shall request and authorize credit card payment before allowing a user to stream a movie.': Functional Suitability
'Promotional updates to the website should take a day to update.': Maintainability
'The same hardware supporting the current website will be used to support the new system.': Compatibility
'The product shall allow a player to position ships horizontally on their grid.': Functional Suitability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The user shall easily locate instructions while using the product. User help can be found within 90% of the system.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The system shall be able to call the seller or buyer to schedule an appointment': Functional Suitability
'The application shall ask the user to confirm dropping a player or trading a player before performing the action.': Usability
'The system shall protect private information in accordance with the organization’s information policy.': Security
'100% of cardmember services representatives shall be able to successfully create a dispute case on the first encounter after completing the training course.': Usability
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting clinicals including but not limited to clinical section capacity changes and clinical section cancellations.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Posting and Billing System. This will allow the Disputes application to request adjustments to cardmember and merchant’s accounts. All adjustment requests must be sent to the Cardmember Posting and Billing System.': Compatibility
'The product shall maintain the status of each player for a turn either offensive or defensive.': Functional Suitability
'The application shall be able to complete every user transaction within one fourth of a second of receiving the request over the network.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall run on the existing hardware for all environments.': Compatibility

'The product will be available for licensing as a one-server two-five servers or five-or-more servers license.': Compatibility
'Out of 1000 accesses to the system the system is available 999 times.': Reliability
'The response time shall be fast enough to maintain the flow of the game. The response time shall be no more than 2 seconds for 95% of responses and no more than 4% for the remaining responses.': Performance Efficiency
'The interface shall be easy to use. 90% of users should be able to successfully use the system to generate a report on their first use. The interface should adhere to IBM usability standards.': Usability
'The system shall display clear property images in the search results': Functional Suitability
'Changes to revenue and expense formulae must be applied to the RFS system every year prior to the budgeting process start. Revenue and expense formulae will be updated within one week of their receipt after which 2 weeks will be allotted to testing of the budget calculations to be conducted jointly by the project development team and PCG Finance.': Maintainability
'The product shall simulate the look of ships at sea.': Usability
'The product shall be updated on a regular basis.The product will have a new major feature introduced every six months and quarterly maintenance releases every six months.': Maintainability
The interface shall have a simple look. In the interface and usability survey 90% of beta testers must report that the interface is adequately simple.': Usability
'Website must be fully operational with MSN TV2.': Compatibility
'The top 1/4 of the table will hold events that are to occur sequentially.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be able to process all transactions.The product shall process minimum of 1 million transactions per year.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall interface CSR and Datastream.The product shall exchange messages between CSR and EAM on a real time basis without any direct interfaces between two systems.': Compatibility
'The WCS system must run queries to the WCS databases once again (on a specified day) to update the available data available to CCR users. Queries must be made to external databases for data refresh once a week.': Maintainability
'The product shall process messages within 2 seconds.The product shall have a maximum message processing time of 2 seconds': Performance Efficiency
'A primary database will be used to store cached data for active users.': Compatibility
'The system shall generate an audit report based on the available recycled parts and the collision estimate.': Functional Suitability
'98% of the user workstations shall meet the minimum hardware requirements prior to implementation. Minimum Hard Disk Space: 400MB.': Compatibility
'Product formulas shall allow use of semi-products which have own formulas.': Functional Suitability
'The audit report shall include the percentage of available recycled parts used in the estimate ': Functional Suitability
'The table side of the display shall be split into 2 regions: sequential and temporal.': Functional Suitability
The product shall ensure that only supervisors can advertise empty time slots.The product must ensure that supervisors are allowed to access advertise empty time slots.': Security
'All movies shall be streamed on demand at any time of the day.': Reliability
'The Commissioner will be the only authorized user per league to adjust league settings.': Security
'The website design should be modern clean and concise.': Usability
'The website shall continue to operate if the payment gateway goes down.': Reliability
'The CMA report shall be returned no later 60 seconds after the user has entered the CMA report criteria.': Performance Efficiency
'Only authorized user shall access the RFS system. ONLY users that exist in the UAS system with the RFS system assigned to their role(s) shall access the RFS system and use it.': Security
'The system shall operate within the Windows XP Professional operating system.': Compatibility
'The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.': Usability
'The system shall have a professional appearance': Usability
'Website shall request and authorize credit card payment before allowing a user to stream a movie.': Functional Suitability
'Promotional updates to the website should take a day to update.': Maintainability
'The same hardware supporting the current website will be used to support the new system.': Compatibility
'The product shall allow a player to position ships horizontally on their grid.': Functional Suitability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document automatically when daily Product Sales data is available.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The system shall be able to call the seller or buyer to schedule an appointment': Functional Suitability
'The application shall ask the user to confirm dropping a player or trading a player before performing the action.': Usability
'The system shall protect private information in accordance with the organization’s information policy.': Security
'100% of cardmember services representatives shall be able to successfully create a dispute case on the first encounter after completing the training course.': Usability
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting clinicals including but not limited to clinical section capacity changes and clinical section cancellations.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Posting and Billing System. This will allow the Disputes application to request adjustments to cardmember and merchant’s accounts. All adjustment requests must be sent to the Cardmember Posting and Billing System.': Compatibility
'The product shall maintain the status of each player for a turn either offensive or defensive.': Functional Suitability
'The application shall be able to complete every user transaction within one fourth of a second of receiving the request over the network.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall run on the existing hardware for all environments.': Compatibility
'The users should be able to easily use the system to successfully complete their budgets within the stipulated time for completion. With a week of training prior to product implementation 98% of the users shall complete their budgets within the stipulated time.': Usability
'The product shall be robust with fault tolerance.The product shall have fault tolerance by using recovery technique compensatory transaction and routing around failures.': Reliability
'The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall interface with the ChoiceParts system once per day at approximately 1:00 AM.': Compatibility
'If the shot was marked as a miss the product shall change the status of the offensive player to defensive': Functional Suitability
'Once a game is initiated the product shall allow each player to position their 5 ships on their respective defensive grids.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to a Nursing Student including student ID student name phone number e-mail status (full time or part time) and program of study.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.': Usability
'The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.': Usability
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional Suitability
'The streaming server will have anti-virus software to prevent infection of malicious viruses.': Security
'The system shall provide a history report of changes made to the Activity or Event data': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow a player to initiate a game by selecting another available player from the list of players.': Functional Suitability
'All aspects of the website shall be accessed by a web browser over the Internet.': Compatibility
'The product shall be supported using the corporate support center.': Compatibility
'A clinical lab section shall include the clinical site name the class instructor day and time of the lab.': Functional Suitability
'Website must interface with the CyberSource API to process credit card transactions.': Compatibility
'The preferred repair facility ratings shall be saved by the system.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System shall generate a User Report that details any new users that have been added and any changes to an existing user’s access level. The report will be reviewed for auditing purposes.': Security
'The product will function alongside server software on any operating system where the Java runtime can be installed.': Compatibility
'Administrator shall be able to activate a pre-paid card via the Administration section in under 5 seconds.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall have the ability to receive automatic software updates as new threats emerge. 100% of customers will be able to receive automatic software updates transmitted to the installed product.': Security
'100% of saved user preferences shall be restored when system comes back online.': Reliability
'The user shall select to save the preferred repair facility ratings.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall comply with corporate color scheme': Usability
'The Disputes System must allow the users to select disputable transactions (based on the age of the transaction) from a user interface and initiate a dispute (ticket retrieval request or chargeback notification) on the selected transaction.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year': Reliability
'The available recycled parts information and their suppliers shall be returned to the user.': Functional Suitability
'The maintenance of the product will fall within the established corporate maintenance windows.': Compatibility
'The product shall be capable of handling the existing 1000 users. This number is expected to grow 5 times within the next year.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall create an exception log of problems encountered within the product for transmission to our company for analysis and resolution.': Reliability
'A class shall be either a non-clinical class or a clinical class.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. : 90% of new users shall be able to start the display of Events or Activities within 90 minutes of using the product.': Usability
'The product shall be able to be installed in the specified environment within 1 working day.': Compatibility
'For each turn the product shall allow the offensive player to define a shot.': Functional Suitability
'Only authorized users shall have access to the portion of the system that interfaces with CampusConnect.': Security
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Usability
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members are the only people who shall have access to clinical site details.': Security

'The product shall ensure that only company employees or external users with company-approved user IDs may have product access. 100% of all logons shall be by either company employees or external users with company-approved user IDs.': Security
'The system shall help the user avoid making mistakes while scheduling classes and clinicals for the nursing students.': Usability
'The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.': Functional Suitability

'The product shall synchronize contacts and appointments in an acceptable time.': Performance Efficiency

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall end a game when a hit by the offensive player results in sinking the last of the defensive player’s ships which had not been previously marked as sunk.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

'System shall let customers register on the website as a “pay as you go” user in under 5 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall notify the realtor when a seller or buyer responds to an appointment request': Functional Suitability
'The product shall conform to the Americans with Disabilities Act.': Usability
'The vendor will verify the invalid lead.': Functional Suitability
'One insurance company shall not be able to view another insurance companys claim data.': Security
'The product shall allow the user to view previously downloaded search results CMA reports and appointments.': Reliability
'100% of the cardmember and merchant services representatives shall use the Disputes application regularly after a 2-day training course.': Usability
'The audit report shall include the total number of recycled parts used in the estimate.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall prevent malicious attacks including denial of service.': Security
'The Disputes application shall support 350 concurrent users without any degradation of performance in the application.': Performance Efficiency
'The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.': Usability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add new classes to a sequence of classes': Functional Suitability
'Only administrators can activate a pre-paid card.': Security
'The product will display an available status for unreserved conference rooms.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be robust.The product shall have fault avoidance based on standards adoption.': Reliability
'The product shall display room equipment according to search parameters.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Information Database. The Cardmember Information Database provides detailed information with regard to a cardmember. All cardmember detail information must be obtained from the Cardmember Information Database.': Compatibility
'The Disputes System shall record the name of the user and the date for any activity that creates or modifies the disputes case in the system. A detailed history of the actions taken on the case including the date and the user that performed the action must be maintained for auditing purposes.': Functional Suitability
'Customer shall be able to check the status of their prepaid card by entering in the PIN number in under 5 seconds.': Performance Efficiency
'A secondary database will be used to store historical statistics and data.': Compatibility
'Izogn Administrator must be able to add new products to the website within 2 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall be built such that it is as secure as possible from malicious interference.': Security
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Statement Database. The Statement Database provides the transaction details to the Disputes System. All transaction details must be obtained from the Statement Database': Compatibility
'The product shall allow a user to remove himself or herself from the list of players at any time.': Functional Suitability
'Movies shall be encoded for 56k and 256k streams.': Compatibility
'Only collision estimators shall search for recycled parts. Users without the collision estimator role shall not have access to the search for recycled parts.': Security
'Movies shall be encoded and streamed via Windows Media Player 9.0.': Compatibility
'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.': Performance Efficiency
'Clinical site information shall include (but not be limited to) the name of the site contact person and contact information.': Functional Suitability
'The response time of general student management tasks shall take no longer than 5 seconds and the response time of schedule generation shall take no longer than 30 seconds.': Performance Efficiency
The system must be available for use between 7:00AM and 11:59PM all days of the year.': Reliability
'The product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be platform independent.The product shall enable access to any type of development environment and platform.': Compatibility
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Usability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.': Functional Suitability
'Realtor shall be able to generate a CMA report based on property criteria': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall be able to cancel a clinical lab section only if there are no students registered for that clinical lab section.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall have a customizable Look and Feel.': Functional Suitability
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional Suitability
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Performance Efficiency
'The Disputes application shall ensure that only users with the appropriate access level are allowed to initiate dispute requests.': Security
'The RFS system should be available 24/7 especially during the budgeting period. The RFS system shall be available 90% of the time all year and 98% during the budgeting period. 2% of the time the system will become available within 1 hour of the time that the situation is reported.': Reliability
'The streaming server will support 50 simultaneous streaming connections.': Performance Efficiency
'The website shall make its user aware of its information practices before collection data from them via a Privacy Policy accessible on all pages of the website.': Security
'Only registered realtors shall be able to access the system.': Security
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a single student to a cohort': Functional Suitability
'The product shall make the users want to use it. 80% of the users surveyed report they are regularly using the product after the first 2 weeks post-launch.': Usability
'System shall let customers register on the website as a “unlimited movie subscriber” user in under 10 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The product will be available for licensing as a one-server two-five servers or five-or-more servers license.': Compatibility
'Out of 1000 accesses to the system the system is available 999 times.': Reliability
'The response time shall be fast enough to maintain the flow of the game. The response time shall be no more than 2 seconds for 95% of responses and no more than 4% for the remaining responses.': Performance Efficiency
'The interface shall be easy to use. 90% of users should be able to successfully use the system to generate a report on their first use. The interface should adhere to IBM usability standards.': Usability
'The system shall display clear property images in the search results': Functional Suitability
'Changes to revenue and expense formulae must be applied to the RFS system every year prior to the budgeting process start. Revenue and expense formulae will be updated within one week of their receipt after which 2 weeks will be allotted to testing of the budget calculations to be conducted jointly by the project development team and PCG Finance.': Maintainability
'The product shall simulate the look of ships at sea.': Usability
'The product shall be updated on a regular basis.The product will have a new major feature introduced every six months and quarterly maintenance releases every six months.': Maintainability

'Website must be fully operational with MSN TV2.': Compatibility
'The top 1/4 of the table will hold events that are to occur sequentially.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be able to process all transactions.The product shall process minimum of 1 million transactions per year.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall interface CSR and Datastream.The product shall exchange messages between CSR and EAM on a real time basis without any direct interfaces between two systems.': Compatibility
'The WCS system must run queries to the WCS databases once again (on a specified day) to update the available data available to CCR users. Queries must be made to external databases for data refresh once a week.': Maintainability
'The product shall process messages within 2 seconds.The product shall have a maximum message processing time of 2 seconds': Performance Efficiency
'A primary database will be used to store cached data for active users.': Compatibility
'The system shall generate an audit report based on the available recycled parts and the collision estimate.': Functional Suitability
'98% of the user workstations shall meet the minimum hardware requirements prior to implementation. Minimum Hard Disk Space: 400MB.': Compatibility
'Product formulas shall allow use of semi-products which have own formulas.': Functional Suitability
'The audit report shall include the percentage of available recycled parts used in the estimate ': Functional Suitability
'The table side of the display shall be split into 2 regions: sequential and temporal.': Functional Suitability
The product shall ensure that only supervisors can advertise empty time slots.The product must ensure that supervisors are allowed to access advertise empty time slots.': Security
'All movies shall be streamed on demand at any time of the day.': Reliability
'The Commissioner will be the only authorized user per league to adjust league settings.': Security
'The website design should be modern clean and concise.': Usability
'The website shall continue to operate if the payment gateway goes down.': Reliability
'The CMA report shall be returned no later 60 seconds after the user has entered the CMA report criteria.': Performance Efficiency
'Only authorized user shall access the RFS system. ONLY users that exist in the UAS system with the RFS system assigned to their role(s) shall access the RFS system and use it.': Security
'The system shall operate within the Windows XP Professional operating system.': Compatibility
'The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.': Usability
'The system shall have a professional appearance': Usability
'Website shall request and authorize credit card payment before allowing a user to stream a movie.': Functional Suitability
'Promotional updates to the website should take a day to update.': Maintainability
'The same hardware supporting the current website will be used to support the new system.': Compatibility
'The product shall allow a player to position ships horizontally on their grid.': Functional Suitability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall respond fast to keep up-to-date data in the display.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The system shall be able to call the seller or buyer to schedule an appointment': Functional Suitability
'The application shall ask the user to confirm dropping a player or trading a player before performing the action.': Usability
'The system shall protect private information in accordance with the organization’s information policy.': Security
'100% of cardmember services representatives shall be able to successfully create a dispute case on the first encounter after completing the training course.': Usability
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting clinicals including but not limited to clinical section capacity changes and clinical section cancellations.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Posting and Billing System. This will allow the Disputes application to request adjustments to cardmember and merchant’s accounts. All adjustment requests must be sent to the Cardmember Posting and Billing System.': Compatibility
'The product shall maintain the status of each player for a turn either offensive or defensive.': Functional Suitability
'The application shall be able to complete every user transaction within one fourth of a second of receiving the request over the network.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall run on the existing hardware for all environments.': Compatibility
'The users should be able to easily use the system to successfully complete their budgets within the stipulated time for completion. With a week of training prior to product implementation 98% of the users shall complete their budgets within the stipulated time.': Usability
'The product shall be robust with fault tolerance.The product shall have fault tolerance by using recovery technique compensatory transaction and routing around failures.': Reliability
'The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall interface with the ChoiceParts system once per day at approximately 1:00 AM.': Compatibility
'If the shot was marked as a miss the product shall change the status of the offensive player to defensive': Functional Suitability
'Once a game is initiated the product shall allow each player to position their 5 ships on their respective defensive grids.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to a Nursing Student including student ID student name phone number e-mail status (full time or part time) and program of study.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.': Usability
'The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.': Usability
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional Suitability
'The streaming server will have anti-virus software to prevent infection of malicious viruses.': Security
'The system shall provide a history report of changes made to the Activity or Event data': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow a player to initiate a game by selecting another available player from the list of players.': Functional Suitability

'The product shall be supported using the corporate support center.': Compatibility

'Administrator shall be able to activate a pre-paid card via the Administration section in under 5 seconds.': Performance Efficiency

'100% of saved user preferences shall be restored when system comes back online.': Reliability
'The user shall select to save the preferred repair facility ratings.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall comply with corporate color scheme': Usability
'The Disputes System must allow the users to select disputable transactions (based on the age of the transaction) from a user interface and initiate a dispute (ticket retrieval request or chargeback notification) on the selected transaction.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year': Reliability
'The available recycled parts information and their suppliers shall be returned to the user.': Functional Suitability
'The maintenance of the product will fall within the established corporate maintenance windows.': Compatibility
'The product shall be capable of handling the existing 1000 users. This number is expected to grow 5 times within the next year.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall create an exception log of problems encountered within the product for transmission to our company for analysis and resolution.': Reliability

'The same hardware supporting the current website will be used to support the new system.': Compatibility
'The product shall allow a player to position ships horizontally on their grid.': Functional Suitability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall prevent a player from viewing the offensive or defensive grids of the other player.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The system shall be able to call the seller or buyer to schedule an appointment': Functional Suitability
'The application shall ask the user to confirm dropping a player or trading a player before performing the action.': Usability
'The system shall protect private information in accordance with the organization’s information policy.': Security
'100% of cardmember services representatives shall be able to successfully create a dispute case on the first encounter after completing the training course.': Usability
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting clinicals including but not limited to clinical section capacity changes and clinical section cancellations.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Posting and Billing System. This will allow the Disputes application to request adjustments to cardmember and merchant’s accounts. All adjustment requests must be sent to the Cardmember Posting and Billing System.': Compatibility
'The product shall maintain the status of each player for a turn either offensive or defensive.': Functional Suitability
'The application shall be able to complete every user transaction within one fourth of a second of receiving the request over the network.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall run on the existing hardware for all environments.': Compatibility
'The users should be able to easily use the system to successfully complete their budgets within the stipulated time for completion. With a week of training prior to product implementation 98% of the users shall complete their budgets within the stipulated time.': Usability
'The product shall be robust with fault tolerance.The product shall have fault tolerance by using recovery technique compensatory transaction and routing around failures.': Reliability
'The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall interface with the ChoiceParts system once per day at approximately 1:00 AM.': Compatibility
'If the shot was marked as a miss the product shall change the status of the offensive player to defensive': Functional Suitability
'Once a game is initiated the product shall allow each player to position their 5 ships on their respective defensive grids.': Functional Suitability

'The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.': Usability
